description:
This fifth session will be hosted by Veniam (https://veniam.com) with two talks from Daniel Moura (https://www.linkedin.com/in/dmoura), and Hugo Peixoto (https://www.linkedin.com/in/hugopeixoto). 

Talk 1: Visualising graphs with millions of edges using edge bundling by Daniel Moura
Talk 2: Ethereum: A secure decentralised generalised transaction ledger by Hugo Peixoto
name: PWL #05 :: Edge Bundling and Ethereum
